name: Anonymous
comment:
>>37809157
> Tell the party the rest of your consultation.
"Any of you guys ever heard someone mention the name Kjorikos?"

It'd be nice to know if someone has more information, since "powerful entity" is a little vague. It could be benevolent or a Raid Boss that'd make the Pegasus a midboss in retrospect.

Opening the wall can wait a bit until we've got ourselves sorted seeing as we've got the key. Once the door's open, we don't know what to expect, and theoretically anyone else can walk right in if we find ourselves needing to regroup since we don't know whether or not it can be re-locked.
